com.hissain.jscipy.math

Class Interpolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hissain.jscipy.math.Interpolation

  • public class Interpolation
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for 1D interpolation operations. Supports Linear, Quadratic, Cubic and general B-Spline interpolation.


    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Interpolation()

      • Interpolation

        public Interpolation()

    • Method Detail

      • linear

        public double[] linear(double[] x,
                       double[] y,
                       double[] newX)
        Performs linear interpolation.
        Parameters:
        x - Known x-coordinates (must be sorted).
        y - Known y-coordinates corresponding to x.
        newX - New x-coordinates to evaluate.
        Returns:
        Interpolated y-values at newX.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if x and y lengths differ or are insufficient.

      • cubic

        public double[] cubic(double[] x,
                      double[] y,
                      double[] newX)
        Performs cubic spline interpolation.
        Parameters:
        x - Known x-coordinates (must be sorted).
        y - Known y-coordinates corresponding to x.
        newX - New x-coordinates to evaluate.
        Returns:
        Interpolated y-values at newX.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if x and y lengths differ or are insufficient.

      • quadratic

        public double[] quadratic(double[] x,
                          double[] y,
                          double[] newX)
        Performs quadratic spline interpolation.

        Replicates SciPy's `interp1d(kind='quadratic')` implementation using B-splines with clamped boundary conditions and internal knots at midpoints.

        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinates of the data points (must be sorted).
        y - The y-coordinates of the data points.
        newX - The x-coordinates to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The interpolated values.

      • bspline

        public double[] bspline(double[] x,
                        double[] y,
                        double[] newX,
                        int k)
        Performs B-spline interpolation of degree k.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinates of the data points (must be sorted).
        y - The y-coordinates of the data points.
        newX - The x-coordinates to evaluate.
        k - The degree of the B-spline.
        Returns:
        The interpolated values.
